RELEASE NOTES:  

   NO INSTALL/UNRAR & PLAY    

    A unique take on puzzle gameplay by the makers of Half-Life. Portal is a 
    new  type  of single  player  game  that changes  how players  approach, 
    manipulate, and  surmise the  possibilities  in a given environment in a 
    manner similar  to how the  Gravity Gun changed our  approach to  how an 
    object may be leveraged in any given situation..
